greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = n*(n+2*k+1)/2, 0 <= k <= n.
comment: row sums give A059270; Sum_{k=0..n-1} T(n,k) = A000578(n);
central terms give A007742; T(2*n+1,n) = A016754(n);
reference: Léonard Euler, Introduction à l'analyse infinitésimale, tome premier, ACL-Editions, Paris, 1987, p. 353-354
Emile Fourrey, Récréations arithmétiques, Librairie Vuibert, Paris 1899, p. 96
Adrien-Marie Legendre, Théorie des nombres, tome 2, quatrième partie, p.131, troisième édition, Paris, 1830.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 0..125 of triangle, flattened
formula: T(n,k) = T(n,k-1) + n, for k <= n. - _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 03 2011
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 30 2006
